item.title: 越南经纪商或因交易增长和零售业繁荣而进一步反弹
item.description: 随着新系统提高交易能力，以及低借贷成本推动散户投资激增，越南券商股的涨势可能会延续。【原文：A rally in Vietnamese brokerage stocks is likely to extend as a new system increases trading capacity and low borrowing costs fuel an upsurge in retail investing.】

item.title: 英国房地产要价以 10 个月来最快速度上涨
item.description: 在线销售门户网站 Rightmove 的数据显示，英国房产卖家以 10 个月来最快的速度提高了房屋要价，这表明市场信心正在增强。【原文：Britain’s property sellers boosted the prices they’re asking for homes at the quickest pace in 10 months, indicating increasing confidence the market is strengthening, according to the online sales portal Rightmove.】

item.title: 尽管亨特在预算中提供了减免，但英国房东仍将面临更高的房屋销售税
item.description: 尽管英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）本月宣布削减资本利得税，但几乎所有从四月起出售房屋的英国房东最终都将为其利润缴纳更多的税款。【原文：Almost all British landlords selling homes from April will end up paying more tax on their profits despite a cut to the capital gains levy announced by Chancellor Jeremy Hunt this month.】

item.title: 解密习近平振兴中国经济的新口号
item.description: 在中国，口号很重要。从 "中国特色社会主义 "到 "共同富裕"，新口号的采用可能预示着政策的深刻转变。【原文：Slogans matter in China. From “socialism with Chinese characteristics” to “common prosperity” the adoption of new catchphrases can herald profound shifts in policy.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 普京赢得俄罗斯领导人任期六年。波音公司的困境打乱了旅行计划日本首席执行官为加息做准备今天您需要了解的信息【原文：Putin wins six more years as Russia’s leader. Boeing’s woes to disrupt travel schedules. Japan’s CEOs prepare for rate hike. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 铁矿石延续跌势，跌破 100 美元，中国忧虑刺激其下跌
item.description: 铁矿石创下自去年 5 月以来的最低水平，交易价格远低于每吨 100 美元，因为中国的数据可能表明其庞大的钢铁行业将进一步疲软。【原文：Iron ore hit the lowest level since last May to trade well below $100 a ton ahead of data from China that may point to further weakness across its vast steel industry.】

item.title: 林吉特反弹，马来西亚债券跑赢亚洲新兴国家债券
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特是本月表现最佳的新兴亚洲货币之一，这为投资者购买该国债券提供了另一个理由。【原文：Malaysia’s ringgit has been one of emerging Asia’s best performer this month, giving investors another reason to buy the nation’s bonds.】

item.title: 更多俄罗斯炼油厂遭袭后，石油保持每周涨势
item.description: 由于乌克兰对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击加剧了地缘政治风险，石油价格在创下一个月来最大单周涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest weekly advance in a month as Ukrainian attacks on Russian refineries heightened geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 高盛认为日本央行周二将取消负利率
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）目前预计，日本央行将在周二的会议上进行 2007 年以来的首次加息，因为工资水平的提高以及最近几天的一些新闻报道都暗示日本央行正在酝酿加息。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. now expects the Bank of Japan will raise interest rates for the first time since 2007 at Tuesday’s meeting, after stronger wage outcomes and a number of news articles over recent days suggested a move is afoot.】

item.title: 澳大利亚锂矿开采商收购镍矿加工厂
item.description: 多元化矿业公司矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）从波塞冬镍业有限公司（Poseidon Nickel Ltd.）收购了位于西澳大利亚的一家镍选矿厂，用于将其锂矿石加工成精矿。【原文：Diversified miner Mineral Resources Ltd. has acquired a nickel concentrator plant in Western Australia from Poseidon Nickel Ltd. to process its lithium ore into concentrate.】

item.title: 央行周前亚洲股市走势低迷：市场综述
item.description: 本周，日本央行和美联储将分别做出政策决定，这可能将为全球市场的近期走向指明方向。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a mixed start into a week that includes policy decisions from the Bank of Japan and Federal Reserve that will likely set the near-term direction for global markets.】

item.title: 热带气旋 "梅甘 "关闭了澳大利亚北部的主要矿山
item.description: 随着强烈热带气旋梅甘（Megan）向海岸线靠近，澳大利亚最北部的居民正准备迎接破坏性的狂风和强降雨，这促使人们撤离并关闭了一个大型锰矿。【原文：Residents in Australia’s far north are bracing for destructive winds and intense rainfall as Severe Tropical Cyclone Megan moves closer to the coastline, prompting evacuations and the closure of a major manganese mine.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 美国准备放宽其全面计划的拟议年度要求，以积极减少尾气排放并提高电动汽车销量。能源转型将成为休斯敦 CERAWeek by S&P Global 会议的热门话题，该会议是业界最大的全球活动之一。与此同时，对于农业强国巴西来说，该国大豆产量预测之间的差异越来越大。【原文：The US is poised to ease proposed yearly requirements of its sweeping plan to aggressively cut tailpipe emissions and ramp up electric vehicle sales. The energy transition will be a hot topic as CERAWeek by S&P Global conference, one of the industry’s biggest global events, gets underway in Houston. Meanwhile, for agriculture powerhouse Brazil, there’s a growing discrepancy between projections for the nation’s soybean crop.】

item.title: 日本央行此举 "只是时间问题"，日本首席执行官认为物价和工资将随之上涨
item.description: 日本的首席执行官们正在为他们的企业自 2007 年以来的首次加息做准备，人们普遍预计央行将在几周甚至几天内结束负利率政策。【原文：Japan’s chief executives are preparing their businesses for the first rate hike since 2007, with the central bank widely expected to end its negative interest rate policy within weeks, or even days.】

item.title: Venture Global 收购液化天然气船队，向全球销售燃料
item.description: 卷入与几家客户纠纷的美国液化天然气出口商 Venture Global LNG Inc.【原文：Venture Global LNG Inc., the US liquefied natural gas exporter embroiled in a dispute with several of its customers, is acquiring nine LNG carriers and expanding its sales operations to market their cargoes.】

item.title: 债券交易员屈服于美联储 "长期走高 "的现实
item.description: 曾一度坚信美联储将在本周开始降息的债券投资者，正在痛苦地屈服于 "更高更久 "的现实，市场前路一片迷茫。【原文：Bond investors who were once convinced that the Federal Reserve would start cutting interest rates this week are painfully surrendering to a higher-for-longer reality and a murky path forward for the market.】

item.title: 路透社称 Reddit 首次公开募股超额认购多达五倍
item.description: 路透社援引知情人士的话报道称，Reddit 公司的首次公开募股获得了四到五倍的超额认购。【原文：Reddit Inc.’s initial public offering is between four and five times oversubscribed, Reuters reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济步入慢车道，将延长利率暂停期
德国和法国带头呼吁欧洲投资银行加强国防融资
item.description: 德国和法国与其他 12 个欧盟国家一道，呼吁欧洲投资银行加强国防融资，作为在俄罗斯入侵的情况下增强欧盟安全的一种手段。【原文：Germany and France joined 12 other European Union countries in calling for the European Investment Bank to enhance its financing for defense as a means to boost the bloc’s security in light of Russian aggression.】

item.title: Shift4 首席执行官告诉员工，收购出价未能充分评估公司价值
item.description: Shift4 Payments Inc.首席执行官贾里德-艾萨克曼（Jared Isaacman）说，潜在收购者的出价未能 "充分估价 "这家支付公司。【原文：Shift4 Payments Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jared Isaacman said bids from potential suitors have failed to “sufficiently value” the payments firm.】

item.title: 阿布扎比加快乡村俱乐部准入以吸引对冲基金
item.description: 阿布扎比的官员们正在悄悄地策划一套新的福利方案，他们希望这套方案能帮助阿布扎比在世界最大金融中心的行列中崭露头角，包括帮助交易商为他们的子女获得梦寐以求的学校入学资格，以及帮助他们获得乡村俱乐部的会员资格。【原文：Abu Dhabi officials are quietly orchestrating a fresh package of perks they hope will help propel the city up the ranks of the world’s biggest financial centers, from helping traders obtain coveted school admissions for their children to assisting them with securing memberships at country clubs.】

item.title: 交易员从消费类股票中寻找美联储走向的线索
item.description: 随着美联储准备在本周召开会议并透露他们对利率走势的看法，交易员们正在股市的一个关键角落寻找线索：生产美国人购买的商品的公司股票。【原文：With the Federal Reserve prepared to meet this week and reveal their thinking about the path for interest rates, traders are looking to a key corner of the stock market for clues: shares of companies that make the stuff Americans buy.】

item.title: 航空公司削减计划，波音公司的痛苦波及旅客
item.description: 波音公司 2024 年灾难性的开局正波及航空公司及其乘客，因为这家美国飞机制造商的生产延误加剧了本已初现端倪的单通道喷气式飞机的短缺，而单通道喷气式飞机是商业航空旅行的支柱。【原文：Boeing Co.’s disastrous start to 2024 is spilling over to airlines and their passengers as production delays at the US planemaker exacerbate an already nascent shortage of single-aisle jets that form the backbone of commercial air travel.】

item.title: 前沿市场以 "彻底转变 "赢得债券投资者青睐
item.description: 前沿市场已开始积极转变政策，本币债券投资者也开始从中获益。【原文：Frontier markets have embarked on aggressive policy shifts, and investors in local-currency bonds are starting to reap the benefits.】

item.title: 据说沙特财富基金正在洽谈收购国家航空公司事宜
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在就收购沙特旗舰航空公司进行早期谈判，该基金希望投入数十亿美元将沙特打造成旅游热点。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in early talks to acquire the kingdom’s flagship carrier as it looks to pour billions of dollars into turning the country into a tourism hotspot.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长德科斯称首次降息可能在 6 月到来
Binance CEO Teng 预计比特币将因 ETF 流入而突破 80,000 美元
item.description: Binance 首席执行官理查德-滕（Richard Teng）表示，随着机构投资者将更多资金投入加密货币支持的交易所交易基金，比特币将继续破纪录的涨势，并升至 8 万美元以上。【原文：Bitcoin is set to continue its record-breaking rally and rise above $80,000 as institutional investors pour more money into the crypto-backed exchange-traded funds, according to Binance Chief Executive Officer Richard Teng.】

item.title: 中央银行行长表示，荷兰新政府必须严格管理财政
item.description: 2022年10月12日星期三，在美国华盛顿特区举行的国际金融学会（IIF）年度会员大会上，荷兰银行总裁克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）发表讲话。今年会议的主题是 "在不确定、调整和转型时代寻求稳定"。摄影师：Ting Shen/Bloomberg【原文：Klaas Knot, president, De Nederlandsche Bank N.V., speaks during the Institute of International Finance (IIF) annual membership meeting in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, Oct. 12, 2022. This year's conference theme is "The Search for Stability in an Era of Uncertainty, Realignment and Transformation." Photographer: Ting Shen/Bloomberg】

item.title: BAT 首席执行官称将上市地点迁至纽约是分散注意力：金融时报
item.description: 英美烟草公司首席执行官塔德乌-马罗科（Tadeu Marroco）告诉《金融时报》，将英美烟草公司的上市地从伦敦转到纽约会造成很多内部干扰。【原文：Switching British American Tobacco Plc’s listing from London to New York would create a lot of internal distraction, Chief Executive Officer Tadeu Marroco told the Financial Times.】

item.title: 威尼斯五星级酒店为 Signa Prime 债权人带来一线希望
item.description: 威尼斯的一家五星级酒店可能是其破产所有者 Signa Prime Selection AG 的债权人挽回部分损失的最佳机会之一。【原文：A five-star hotel in Venice might just be one of the best chances for creditors of its insolvent owner, Signa Prime Selection AG, to recoup some of their losses.】
